name: lookup
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool people_lookup.
Tool description: People Lookup API helps you search for and find phone, email, linkedin and more information for people in the USA
API description: Lookup people by name and optional US state using the RapidAPI service.

name.description: The name of the person to lookup.

state.description: The US state to narrow down the search. Defaults to 'NE'.
